verbose_text: The inhibition of mTORC1 or mTORC2 by the transient or moderate activation of MEK / ERK moderately enhanced Beclin 1 expression, resulting in cytoprotective autophagy, whereas the inhibition of both mTORC1 and mTORC2 by sustained MEK / ERK activation strongly induced Beclin 1 expression, leading to cytodestructive autophagy.
